odnoklassnikiLikeBox.help_5: Copy the ID and paste it into the «Your group ID» box.

where to get api key.title: Where to find API key:
where to get api key.text:
— Open the Configuration tab in your LiveAgent account;
— Under Configuration click on System > API;
— Copy the key from the "Your API key" field.
